description: Installation of external A/C condenser unit at basement level front lightwell
decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">All building services plants located externally within the development shall be supported on adequate proprietary anti-vibration mounts as necessary to prevent the&nbsp;</span><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">transmission of vibration and regenerated noise to within adjacent parts of the proposed building(s) and these shall be so maintained thereafter.</span><br style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;"></p><p><br style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;"><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">Reason: To protect the amenities of residential occupiers.</span><br></p>

<p><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">Noise emitted by plant equipment including from atmospheric vents shall be -10dBA below the existing measured lowest LA90(10min) background noise level at&nbsp;</span><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">any time when all plants are in use, where the plant noise source is tonal it shall be 15 dBA. The noise emitted shall be measured or predicted at 1.0m from the facade of&nbsp;</span><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">the nearest residential window or at 1.2m above any adjacent residential garden, terrace, balcony or patio. The equipment shall be serviced regularly in accordance&nbsp;</span><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">with manufacturers instructions and as necessary to ensure that the requirements of the condition are maintained. If at any time the plant is unable to comply with this&nbsp;</span><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">condition,&nbsp; shall be switched off and not used again until it is able to comply.</span><br style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;"></p><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.44; margin-left: 1pt; margin-top: 18pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">Reason:&nbsp; To protect the amenities of residential occupiers.</p>
